column8: J.R.R. Tolkien, author of perhaps the most famous and loved fantasy tale in the history of literature, The Lord of the Rings, was a Professor at Oxford University as well. Friend to C.S. Lewis and master of language, he created many languages - complete with full alphabets - for the many races in the story. This t-shirt celebrates that great achievement.
column21: This t shirt celebrates J.R.R. Tolkien, the writer of the Lord of the Rings and inventor of many full-formed languages, celebrated on this design. From weadmire.net.
